title: Alee
description: Love has never come easy for Alee. Falling in love with your ex-boyfriend's best friend isn't ideal but nothing about Alee's life is normal. When she meets her father, Hawk, a homeless addict who abandoned her as a child. Alee is determined to learn more about the first man to break her heart. Will the man who broke her be the one to save her life?Fans of Juno and Euphoria will enjoy and appreciate Alee's journey.Alee is an emotional story that deals with love and loss. If you are sensitive to trauma, read with caution.
author: Nicole Loufas
